properties.Name: LedgerRelationshipType
properties.Description:
The nature of the relationship between two or more Ledgers.

Ex:
- General Ledger/Subsidiary Ledger

Columns.Name: LedgerRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: LedgerRelationshipTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Ledger Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: LedgerRelationshipTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Ledger Relationship Type.

Properties.Description:
The nature of the relationship between two or more Ledgers.

Ex:
- General Ledger/Subsidiary Ledger
